title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Mix hot pasta with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka masala paste.
Grill or pan-fry until cooked through.
Fry onions until golden, then add tomato puree.
Mix in chicken, cook for 5 minutes, and serve.
